products.title: Watermelon
products.description: Watermelon is a large, oval or round fruit with a green rind, typically striped, and a sweet, juicy, red flesh, often containing black seeds.

products.title: Pumpkin
products.description: Pumpkins are large, round, typically orange fruits with a thick, smooth, and slightly ribbed rind.

products.title: Apple
products.description: An apple is a round, edible fruit produced by an apple tree (Malus spp.). Fruit trees of the orchard or domestic apple

products.title: Chocolates
products.description: Chocolate is a food made from roasted and ground cocoa beans that can be a liquid, solid, or paste, either by itself or to flavor other foods

products.title: Almonds
products.description: Almonds offer a wide array of health benefits due to their rich nutrient profile. They are packed with vitamins, minerals, and healthy fats, contributing to heart health, brain function, and overall well-being

products.title: Green tea
products.description: Green tea offers a wide array of health benefits due to its rich antioxidant content, particularly catechins like EGCG. These include potential protection against heart disease, certain cancers, and cognitive decline, as well as aid in weight management and skin health.

products.title: Ice Creams
products.description: Ice cream can offer several benefits, including being a source of essential nutrients like calcium, vitamins A, D, and B12, and providing a boost to the immune system
keyPoints: It helps in strengthening your bones

products.title: Kiwi
products.description: Kiwis offer a variety of health benefits due to their rich nutritional profile. They are a good source of vitamin C, antioxidants, and fiber, which can support the immune system, aid digestion, and promote heart health.
keyPoints: Kiwi can help you reach optimal blood levels of vitamin C.
Kiwis is a smart way to support heart health
Kiwis contain both insoluble and soluble fiber.
Kiwis may be a good choice for people who have constipation
